thread.title: Sophie Kumar-Taylor
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Sophie Kumar-Taylor

author: Sophie Kumar-Taylor
title: Sophie Kumar-Taylor
text: My flowerswere supposed to arrive yesterday and they didn't so I emailed them and asked where they were . They replied saying that a calling card was left by Royal Mail yesterday however Royal Mail emailed me saying they left the card this morning so the man from prestige flowers lied to me
